posts.title: Vinyl is the new Record
posts.author: Mia Zapata
posts.content: Did you know records are made out of vinyl?. I asked like 50 people in a restaurant and on then on the street, after they kicked me out of the restaurant, and only 100 of them knew that albums and records are not the same thing.

posts.title: Set up the perfect bathroom recording mic
posts.author: Scantilly Lace
posts.content: When you need to record vocals but had some dodgy thai food. Brings a whole new meaning to the phrase 'on air' now don't it.....

posts.title: My dad's studio can beat up your dad's studio
posts.author: Anonymouse
posts.content: nanner nanner boo boo stick your head in doo doo. And a bunch of other childish things to say that only an adult would say to make a child cry beacuse they have no soul. You know who had soul?.....Chester Copperpot....
